content.prompt: Build a visually appealing, high-converting website for {{business_name}}, a local {{service_type}} business. Design should be premium yet approachable, with modern aesthetics and playful details tailored for local customers.

sections.name: Navbar
sections.description: Sticky, animated hover, {{business_name}} logo, small placeholder icon

sections.name: Hero
sections.description: Full-width {{hero_gradient}} gradient, bold headline, tagline, CTA ({{cta_text}}), large placeholder image
sections.mobile: Use 'h-screen md:h-96', 'flex-col md:flex-row' for responsive layout

sections.name: About
sections.description: Placeholder team/workspace image, short story text

sections.name: Services
sections.description: Cards with placeholder image per service
sections.mobile: Grid with 'grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3' responsive columns

sections.name: Testimonials
sections.description: Placeholder customer/project images, glassmorphism review cards with star ratings

sections.name: Gallery
sections.mobile: Grid with 'grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4' responsive layout

sections.name: Contact
sections.description: Form, embedded map, placeholder background image

sections.name: Footer
sections.description: {{business_name}} logo, links, socials, placeholder background pattern

images.sources: Use two recyclable placeholder images from Unsplash (https://unsplash.com/photos/J5feaur-y6I and https://unsplash.com/photos/e080KjvQKGc) for all sections. I'll replace them with actual images later.
images.styling: Use 'w-full h-auto' for responsive images, 'object-cover' for consistent sizing

typography.mobile: Use 'text-2xl md:text-4xl' for responsive font sizes

design.vibe: premium, approachable, trust-building for local customers

mobile.layout: Use 'flex flex-col' for mobile, 'md:flex-row' for desktop stacking
mobile.navigation: Hidden mobile menu with 'hidden md:flex', hamburger with 'md:hidden'
mobile.spacing: Use 'p-4 md:p-8', 'm-2 md:m-4' for responsive padding/margins
mobile.containers: Use 'max-w-full md:max-w-6xl mx-auto px-4' for responsive containers

netlify.config: Create a netlify.toml file with build settings for Vite React deployment
